segment.source: The goal of deployment planning is to successfully and efficiently deploy Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 so that it does not disrupt your users or the network.
segment.target: The goal of deployment planning is to successfully and efficiently deploy Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 so that it does not disrupt your users or the network.

segment.source: Before you deploy DaRT 8.0, you should consider the different deployment configurations and prerequisites.
segment.target: Before you deploy DaRT 8.0, you should consider the different deployment configurations and prerequisites.

segment.source: This section includes information that can help you gather the information to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.
segment.target: This section includes information that can help you gather the information to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.

segment.source: There are several deployment configurations and prerequisites that you must consider before you create your deployment plan.
segment.target: There are several deployment configurations and prerequisites that you must consider before you create your deployment plan.

segment.source: This section includes information that can help you gather the information that you must have to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.
segment.target: This section includes information that can help you gather the information that you must have to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.

segment.source: This checklist can assist you in preparing your computing environment for the DaRT deployment.
segment.target: This checklist can assist you in preparing your computing environment for the DaRT deployment.
